item.title: Anki Templates - An introduction to HTML
item.description: Anki utilizes HTML in its template engine. HTML is quite easy to pick up, and a basic understanding will get you started in improving your Anki templates right away!

item.title: Basic CSS-Template for Anki
item.description: I’ve always wanted to create a “base”-style for Anki. Several elements (for instance lists) don’t look that great in Anki, and I have created a small CSS to rectify that.

item.title: Adding Hints in Anki
item.description: Ever wondered how you can add a hint in Anki, for the time when you just can’t remember an answer? It’s rather simple with some basic CSS and JavaScript

item.title: CSS in Anki â€” Beyond the basics
item.description: You can style your cards in Anki with CSS, that’s nothing new. But we can also use some not so obvious CSS to add visual cues to help us remember stuff on our cards.

item.title: Sharing CSS across multiple cards in Anki
item.description: Tired of copying and pasting various CSS snippets across multiple cards? By using the CSS @include, you can share the same CSS file across multiple cards.
